text: Two ships of the Royal Navy have borne the name HMS Jonquil, after the flower: * was an sloop launched in 1915 and sold in May 1920 to Portugal, becoming Portuguese warship NRP Carvalho Araújo, discarded 1959. * was a launched in 1940 and sold in 1946 becoming the mercantile Lemnos Category:Royal Navy ship names
title: HMS Jonquil
